name: Triamid Artifact
text: If this card is Normal Summoned: You can add up to 2 "Triamid" cards from your Deck to your hand, but you cannot activate cards, or the effects of cards, with those names for the rest of this turn. If this card is sent to the GY: You can banish this card; add 1 "Triamid" card from your GY to your hand except "Triamid Artifact" You can only use each effect of "Triamid Artifact" once per turn.
